name: Salamandra & Phoenix (v1)
text:
During this Duel, you can Normal Summon/Set "Phoenix Gearfried" without Tributing.
The following effect can be used once per Duel by revealing 1 "Immortal Phoenix Gearfried" from your hand. Set 1 "Salamandra" from outside of your Deck, and send 1 "Legendary Sword" from outside of your Deck to the Graveyard.
This Skill can be used/applied if you begin the Duel with a Deck (excluding Extra Deck) that contains at least 10 FIRE Warrior-Type monsters.
